file_content.text: We'll receive our shuttle passes soon. I can already feel Shili's grass between my toes.
Our clearance permits, you find them!
They're all yours.
Thank you. I thought we'd never escape this wasteland.
We must prepare for departure. Soon the sun of Shili will warm our faces again!
Some people would pay a fortune to escape Hoth. Would you do the same?
What are they worth to you?
Our bonuses. Take them. Anything to leave this wretched place.
I'd suggest you leave this planet soon as well. It's freezing your heart.
Our homeplanet calls us. Please find our permits.
Master Jedi, please, so cold....
Please, my team, we need your help.
Republic friends, please, so cold....
We've been on Hoth for years, fighting for the Republic, freezing, barely surviving.
We were almost free, but a surprise attack... snow melted by Togruta blood. We're all that's left.
The Republic values your sacrifice. We will not tolerate this injustice.
This won't stand.
Thank you, Master Jedi. I feared we'd never find a sympathetic ear.
The stresses of battle can destroy the strongest warriors. Who did this to you?
You sound traumatized.
An attack on our allies is an attack against the Republic.
The Republic protects its own.
That's good to hear, sir.
Look on the bright side: You're alive, and you've got the ear of the sharpest smuggler on this ice cube.
You need some cheering up.
Thank you, but freedom was so close... we can't help but feel cursed.
Did someone attack you?
The Empire. They ruined everything!
Are you alright?
Nothing serious. But we lost everything, just when we could taste freedom.
Hoth's harsh. Deal with it.
You're right. It's just that freedom was so close.
High Command removed us from combat rotation. We received clearance, packed to go home to Shili. Then the Imperials raided our camp.
We escaped with our lives, but we left our clearance permits behind. Can't leave Hoth without them. Reissues take six months minimum, and we won't survive that long.
I'll get your clearance.
Oh, thank you! I'm glad Hoth hasn't worn you down yet.
I could sneak you off Hoth, and the Republic wouldn't have a clue.
Clearance shmearance.
Thank you, Captain, but we must return home proud, not as fugitives.
Don't get your hopes up.
Our hopes have been crushed once already. We've learned to expect nothing.
Last we saw, our camp was overrun with Imperials. If you find our clearance permits, we'd be grateful.
Tough. [Refuse quest]
Yeah. We've heard that one before.
So cold....
